title: Aural set, A minor/simple error detection m 3

content.description: You will hear an excerpt from a suite for keyboard. The score is printed correctly below, but the version that you will hear contains errors in either pitch or rhythm in measures 2, 3, 6, and 8. The music will be played four times. Before listening to the music for the first time, please read the questions and look at the score.
content.question: In measure 3, there is an error in

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Apply knowledge of musical symbols and terms to detect discrepancies in pitch and rhythm when comparing notated and performed music in one or two voices.
